And what did I do to her. She told me that we went to the same middle school but different classes. She told me she wrote a confession letter, but I never went to the place we were supposed to meet up. She told me she sent multiple letters but I never went. I told her I never received any letters and she probably was putting it in a wrong locker. She told me that she was very sorry and wanted to fix my relationship with her but I told her that it would be better if she just stayed out of my life and business. After that I never saw her again and I started to go out with a girl that was a very close friend to me. I left my parents house the day I graduated and started living with my girlfriend. Getting into college was also hard because of that incident but the counselor from my old school told the college it was just a misunderstanding. I think I underwent my own character development arc.
And they had the audacity to say kill all men. @hent@i stay strong bro and smart thing not to go to that meeting place.

Wtf 1 week only? They should get kicked. rape accusations are not small things. just by an accusation a person's life has been pretty much been destroyed. Also hope you're doing well man

The police said that they saw the recording  of the school cameras and saw that my intentions where of apologizing and not trying to rape her based on my body language. Also they said they where no other people around so her having witnesses was not valid. After they told my    family that I was innocent it became very awkward around the house so I stayed outside more often. The school called and told me that I could return so I did, way better than staying home. The girl and her two friends got suspended for one week. I still hang out with some of my friends that believe I was innocent, and tried to fix my relationship with others that did not. After the girl returned she tried to apologize to me by telling me to meet her in a more private place so she could talk. But I just didn’t care and never went to the places she told me to meet her. One day she just caught up to me while I was walking home    and told me she planned it all just to get back at me. I told her I did not know her.
@Hent@! Yo I think you should seek help man. Sorry for all the shit you went through but sray tough man.

I had two younger siblings, a younger sister in her last year of middle school and a little brother in 5th grade. I have always gotten along with my younger sister and we always played games together, but after that incident she started to distance herself which I totally understood and did not resent her for that. But I still felt a little down knowing that even my family was afraid of me for something I didn’t do. The  only person that acted normal around me was my little brother. I think he didn’t understand the situation or just didn’t care. After one week of the accident I looked for a job and started working because I decided I was going to leave the house after as soon as I graduated. However it seems that the family of that stupid little bitch was not satisfied with my one month suspension and involved the police in it, they wanted to press charges on me. I think that was their mistake because the police found out I was not guilty. Ig they thought they could get away  with it.

By the time it was lunch the principal office call me  to go to their office and that girl was there with 2 other girl friends. Turns out those 2 other friends where “witnesses”, but they where not even there when all that shit happened. The principal started explaining that they had accused me of trying to rape her and I told him that I was not and that I normally use those showers after soccers training and I just happened to walked in on her. Even tho I explained everything they took the side of the girl because she had “witnesses”. They told me that I was going to be suspended for a month and they called my parents to tell them about all that was happening. I told my parents that I did not try to rape her, but they didn’t believe me. My father disowned me and every day of the month I was suspended he was just saying that he was not the father of a rapist or other comments like that. My mother did not say anything, but it was clear she was very disappointed with me.

Since this is a bland boring hentai I would like to share a experience I had in high school. I was in my junior year of high school when a girl I didn’t know accuse me of trying to “rape” her. I was in the soccer team for my school and since we had to take showers after every training I always went to a shower room that was a little secluded to have my privacy while having showers. Since those showers where secluded almost no one went there.  But one day when I entered the shower there was a girl changing after her shower, and I tried to apologize on walking into her while she was changing, but she started screaming that I was trying to rape her and I told her I was not that I normally use this showers instead of the other ones but she was not listening and ran off. I thought that was the end of it and nothing was going to happen after that. The next day started off normally but I started hearing people in my class mentioning my name in their conversation and I knew something was wrong
